title: KOJAYHOL Whack A Mole Game with 2 Hammers Toy, Whack Game Toy with Mole for 3 4 5 6 7 8 Years Old Boys Girls, Interactive Educational Toys with Sound and Light
seller_info_text: Dongguan DaYehu dianzi shangwu youxian gongsi
features: ‚ú® CLASSIC CHILDREN'S TOYS- Let your child experience the charm of arcade games at home! The whack a mole game for toddlers set features a unique and cute green otter design! Cartoonising the otter adds to the excitement and fun of the game for kids! This percussion toy features 12 coins, 2 mini hammers and 7 little moles! This amazing mini tabletop game is just what you need and will bring endless fun to your kids.

üìç SOLO MODE/PK MODE- Throw away the TV, mobile phone, computer, you can join this competitive whack game with hammer with your kids. the LCD display records your score, the difficulty increases as the game progresses, click on the randomly lighted gophers, 1 life point is deducted for a wrong hit, 1 life point is added for a level you beat, if you lose all 6 lives the LED light will go out and your turn is over!

üíñ SAFE & HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS- The toy is made of high quality ABS + PP material, non-toxic and odourless, with smooth edges and no burrs. There are 4 strong suction cups to keep it in place when hit hard, and the two included hammers are very soft and tailored to the size of your child's hand to stand up to constant powerful pounding.

üéá COOL LIGHTS AND SOUND EFFECTS- Lights and sound effects ‚Äòtalk‚Äô like real peers. This game helps your child to develop hand-eye coordination in tapping to improve reflexes, promote brain development, and enhance the sense of competition and teamwork. Please don't take too many coins to play in coin mode, just take one or two, and keep the others for spare to avoid losing. The small cabinet can't hold too many coins at the same time, so it will naturally get stuck.

üéÅ BEAUTIFUL GIFT- This toy is no different from the classic arcade game and requires 3 AA batteries (not included). A hobby toy for boys and girls ages 3 4 5 6 7 8 and up. Children's birthday parties, Christmas gifts, family gatherings, indoor and outdoor fun with parents, increase parent-child interaction and rekindle family nights. Beautiful gifts are ready, come and start the game and challenge the king of whack-a-mole game!
description: Product Description The Best Edutainment Toy - Cartoonish Mole Style Whack-a-Mole Game Spend A Happy Time with Cute Whack Game Mole Toy Bring Your Kid Endless Fun Whack Game Mole are perfect for every age of 3+ years, taste, and event, such as party, festival, preschool education, gifts. It can promote Hand-eye Coordination, exercise fine Motor Skill, enhance concentration, boost interpersonal communication by hitting the moles which were lit up. Excellent interactive toy for 3 years old boys and girls. Tap the cute gopher to have fun. It is a improved miniature tabletop version base on the classic whack a mole game, which helps reduce the threshold of game, even 3 years old kids can play it. It has smooth edges, soft hammers and we used premium materials during production because we know you want only the best for your kids. There is a pause/start button for you to start or continue to play the game. Includes 2 Modes: Practice mode and coin mode. Electronic health points display and scorer, authentic sound effects, just like the original game. There are several levels, each advancing a level, the difficulty will be increased. Perfect Gifts for 3 4 5 6 years old The perfect choice if you are looking for a toy as a Birthday, Easter, Children's day, Christmas, Halloween, Thanksgiving & New Years for any 3 years and up boys or girls. Package included: WHAC-A-MOLE Toy x 1 Little Moles x 7 Hammer x 2 Game Coins x 12 User Manual x 1
